#Worst movies ordered by rating

```{r}
bad_movies<-db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT t.id, t.title, t.production_year, 
  mi1.info AS votes, mi2.info AS rating
FROM title t
JOIN movie_info_idx AS mi1 ON mi1.movie_id = t.id
JOIN movie_info_idx AS mi2 ON mi2.movie_id = t.id
WHERE t.kind_id = 1
  AND mi1.info_type_id = 100
  AND mi2.info_type_id = 101
  AND mi1.info > 100000
  AND t.production_year > 2000
ORDER BY mi2.info
LIMIT 30;")
#View(bad_movies)
#class(bad_movies)
#dim(bad_movies)
bad_movies$votes<-as.numeric(bad_movies$votes)
bad_movies$rating <-as.numeric(bad_movies$rating)
ggplot(data = bad_movies, aes(x = production_year, y = rating )) +
  geom_point()
```
